content.detailedDescription:
dear mufon,
    hello, i would like to share my experience of a very exciting incident which occurred two nights ago on november 17, 2015 in charleston, west virginia. it was almost 8 pm in the evening and was completely dark as i was leaving my mother's house. as i was getting into my car and talking to my mother who was standing next to the car i noticed object come into view behind her in the sky. i asked her what is that mother, she turned around and we both watched the object in amazement. it wasn't very far from us, perhaps 200 or 300 feet just above the treetops and above her roof. it looked like a glowing reddish orange orb. at first it looked like it had flames coming out of the bottom and the top part of it glowed extremely bright orange. it was moving rather quickly in a straight line from east to west against the wind. it did not appear to be a mechanical device although i am not sure because it did not look like anything i had ever seen. as it continued across the sky i pulled my cell phone out of my pocket and began to take pictures. of course as anyone knows who has tried to take pictures of stars or the moon at night, bright objects in the night sky appear much smaller than they  actually were in person. so the pictures appear to be a small orange object but in real life it was much bigger. if you enlarge the object in the picture you can clearly see the shape of the orb and it is very symmetrical. also when i first saw the object it was very close to me however before i could take pictures it had moved quite a distance away. the whole event probably only took about 15 to 20 seconds before it moved out of sight and moved over the mountains headed towards the river. the object made no noise at all and did not seem to be powered by anything that i could tell which resembled an engine or any other power source. at first i thought maybe it was a bag of garbage that had caught on fire and was floating. however it did not move vertically up, it moved horizontally from east to west and just kept on going until it was out of sight. i could not say for sure how big it was it appeared to be about 5 to 10 feet but that is just a guess. i have been thinking about it for two days and i still do not know what i saw. my mother thinks it could have been a drone of some sort, but this does not make sense to me because of the range of the distance it covered and i have never seen a drone that look like that. i have pictures i can download and send to you. i would be very curious to know if anybody else in my area saw this object and reported it to anyone two nights ago. thank you.

                                                                             andrew chattin
content.summary: As i was leaving my mother's house we noticed an orange orb move accross the sky very low and just above the house. at first it looked like it had flames comming out of the bottom but really never seen anything like it. it moved from east for 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Came home and saw 5 lights in a line. one by one the ships would break off to a spot further south and glow extremely bright and then seem to burn out. a red light would be left. the small light would then head north, under the rest of the line. the next ship in line would then fly to the same spot, repeating the process of growing very bright and abruptly dimming. all 5 finished in order and met up in the northeast portion of the sky. two lights would fly parallel to one another until one suddenly flew upward toward the other. they seem to be 'playing' in the sky. the ufos seemed to disguise themselves as planes, emitting a jet-like sound, but only making these noises sometimes, as if on cue. more ships were spotted in the north, spread out over about a mile distance there was about 5. one flew directly overhead and seemed almost star-shaped. from far away they would sometimes look like 2 small yellow orbs and one red orb in between, but would change pattern as light was reduced or gained. the lights seemed to enjoy traveling in close proximity to one another. the ships should not be mistaken for planes as they would ascend or descend in a straight up or down line and were often seen hovering. i felt slightly scared as the one passed directly overhead but mostly remained in awe. i was so amazed and excited. the objects remained in the sky for a long time, flying to different parts.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 12 orbs glow very bright and then seem to go out, almost star shaped ship flew directly over home, abrupt flight changes

content.detailedDescription: I was driving eastbound on college ave. in goshen,in 46526 with my girlfriend on our way to get food. i noticed a "star" in the sky in the same direction we were traveling directly in front of us. i didn't take much notice and continued watching the road. almost immediately after i focused on the road i noticed the star had moved slightly so i turned my focus back to the star, watched it a few seconds to see if it actually was moving. sure enough it was moving but very slowly so i told my girlfriend "hey look a shooting star." we both continued watching it waiting for it to burn out but it didn't. about 3 seconds after i told my girlfriend to look, it started picking up speed very quickly it was traveling in aproxamately the nw direction. we also noticed there was an aura around it with a small tail. total duration was about 1 minuite. i thought it was a shooting star so i didn't get any video/audio/photo evidence.
content.summary: Bright light. stationary like a star, then moved and stopped again. 5 times bigger than a star.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside laying in our lounge chairs watching the meteor shower. my husband said look - there is the iss. i said it can't be because it is too low and too bright. we then notice there were two lights with one following the other. both were the same bright orange solid color. the lights were extremely bright and no flashing. they moved quickly and passed right by us. i could not see any structure other than the lights and absolutely no sound. we first noticed the lights coming from the southwest and passed by going due north in a straight line with no turns. we probably observed the lights about 45 seconds.
content.summary: Two orange bright lights, low, fast, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my dogs, staring at the stars when it looked like a white explosion in the sky. the white light stayed and streaked across the sky with two bright red lines behind it. it just disappeared after about 3 seconds. 

when i first saw the light, i thought it was going to be a shooting star but the two red lines quickly made me change my mind. what ever this was it was very very high.  i've seen shooting stars and meteor showers before. this did not look like anything i had seen before. 

i went inside and told my husband but there was nothing left to see at that point. it kind of made me think of a plane breaking the sound barrier but i heard nothing.
content.summary: Bright white light appeared and shot across sky with two red lines behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
I'd just come back down the hill from dropping my eldest grand daughter at the bus stop. i turned the car off and settled in to wait the 25-30 mins before it was time to take my other grand daughter to her bus at the corner. it was raining hard , my car was off and i was playing a game on my phone. a very strange white noise erupted from my phone, but the screen didn't change, then i did hear a very far off low rumble of thunder. then a flash of light so bright it was almost blinding and my cars' gauges lit up, my radio turned on and off 7-8 times followed by a rumble so low it was almost a whisper....Everything went quiet , gauges and radio quieted....A few moments later it happened again...Except my phone didn't react....If it had been lightening that intense the thunder should have been deafening shaking the very earth....But nothing absolutely nothing....My granddaughter came out to the car, i didn't say a thing, i thought, enough is enough i'll figure out what to do later....But when i tried to start the car , it was absolutely dead....As was my phone....

i have an iphone 6 not even a year old...This wasn't the first time it picked up that nose ....There's been several out of the ordinary wtf moments, and multiple night time sensations/aware of presence events... "at&t" showing up without notice to retire my wifi...

things have gotten worse since i reported my sighting almost a year ago.
content.summary: Was sitting in my car, in my driveway, car off, when "?Lightening?" flashed intensely bright,  it was pouring rain,  all the electrics in my car flashed repeatedly on and off.

content.detailedDescription: I dropped off my granddaughter at the peachtree library for tutoring. upon exiting the parking lot and heading west on route 54 towards sam's, but before crossing over route 74,  i observed the object in the sky while stuck in traffic. it was moving slowly vertically upward with a tail behind it. there were no other objects (planes) in the sky. my granddaughters friend was with me and observed the same event. he is 20 years old. i was so excited to see this unidentified object since i also saw one when i was a child (12). back then my mother told me i had a fever and put a cold cloth on my forehead. i never forgot the event.
content.summary: Observed a white light with a tail moving vertically and slowly upward

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling west bound (in a northerly direction) on interstate 180 which is a spur line connecting williamsport pennsylvania to interstate 80. with me was my then girfriend and her brother who we were picking up from his workplace. several miles from our exit i noticed the the traffic on both east and west bound lanes bound lanes were reacting to something and cars in front were either applying their breaks or were swerving. that's when we noticed it a large, dark, triangular, object flying very low across both lanes of the highway. it's motion seemed to be boobing, fluttering and weaving. cruising atop the west bound lane as it approached my car, my girfriend's brother commented about how strange this thing was and how it was flying, the pilot seemed like he was flying like he was either drunk or stoned. i said, that's no plane or helicopter. by this time the craft was within less then a hundred yards and i had already slowed down quite a bit. i kicked my car out of gear, shut off the ignition (myself and rolled the windows down. the craft made absloutely no sound. by now, the ship was beside the left side of my chevy monza and probably within less than 30 feet. i could easily make out it's shape and structure. i could make out indirect lighting eminating inside of its structured, patterened surface (port holes?). also if you're 30 feet from a running helicopter the noise would shake your wisdom teeth out! the object actually actually reversed momentarily matching my speed which at at that point would have been about 15-20 mph, hovered for several seconds because i was watching it while i steering with my head out of the window. the craft tipped it's left wing up and veered in a wavy motion across the median strip to the east bound lane. (note: there were no faa mandated strobes or red/green wing tip running lights) glancing around i notice there were cars that were also slowing down or had pulled over. i restarted the monza, and basically got out of there. my girlfriend, who incidently was lying down in the backseat suffering from the flu amoung other things and the eterenal skeptic thought it was a helicopter but her brother, who always thought flying saucers nothing but bunk, immediatly became a true believer. 

but, this is not the end of the story. 

several day later i stopped in at a local gas station and the owner, a former korean war marine vet came out. the owner of the station, at the time,had  usually let me pump my own gas. by the way. after a couple minutes of awkward silence, he started out by saying "jim, your an engineer and a stargazer." (i am an amature astronomer)"i saw something other other night i can't explain. to make a long story short. he also was on i-180 that night with his wife, daughter and son-in-law. i didn't ask any leading questions all i said was, "you saw the ship." he answered yes. he too was one of those who thought prople who claimed to see ufos were crack pots. he also was positivley certain that it wasn't and airplane or helicopter. he said he saw plently of choppers in korea to know the difference and was one of the cars which pulled over to watch it, remarking that there was no noise. 

i know this is report happed nearly 40 years ago but i almost feel an obligation to report it and get it off my chest. i was 23 at the time and was a recent college graduate, i've ben amature astronomer and a world war 2 aircraft buff so i do know the difference between convention aircraft and the "non-conventional". i also know what venus amd jupiter look like in the sky :-)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangular craft approx. 40 to 50 feet from wing tip to wing tip.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling back to the store that i work at coming back from a pizza delivery, around six o'clock in the evening, on old ashland city road. i heard a military helicopter flying over. the helicopter was was very loud and low to the ground. so i looked up and beside the helicopter was a bright reddish orange ball of light. the orb was about 20 to 30 feet to the side of the helicopter, it was not in the front,or in the rear, or on the belly side of the helicopter. helicopters do not have lights to the side of the helicopter 20 to 30 feet the helicopter.The lights are usually on the bottom or on the front or in the back connected to it. this light was not connected at all. the orb stayed in pace with the military helicopter until they both flew out of site. the light that this orb was giving off was at least 10 times brighter than what the helicopter had , if not brighter. some of the ft campbell helicopters fly low all the time. and i have seen many helicopters from the past 30 yrs i have lived here. this was an event that really made me stop my car to see what this was.
content.summary: Orb flies next to military helicopter

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work last night, i witnessed some really strange activity in the sky.Traveling from westminster maryland to sykesville/eldersburg on route 32. i saw a lot of lights in the sky, it was cloudy but none of what i saw was up that far. as i started on 32, due to what i noticed i watched as driving (30-40 mph) lights and two huge , thought they were planes, one on either side of 32 traveling with traffic. the one on my left sorta traveled along side of me and was not traveling very fast.Strange to see a plane going that slow. as i got closer to mechanicsville (between westminster & sykesville) i noticed that the two would hover and go up a bit and switched sides of the road. as i traveled it almost seemed as though the one on my left was the same rate of speed as i, 30 mph. i was behind a line of cars & i know they saw the same activity as i. we were all looking. the one on the left seemed to stop in mid air, go backwards about 10 feet then move far left and came back again to follow traffic then sped up a bit towards baltimore. there was no sound from them what so ever. now, i also noticed in the far distance there were two helicopters and possibly a third but i was more interested in the one closest to me. im no aviation expert but i have never seen any type of aircraft do what these two did. they were at least as big as a football field. boomerang in shape on the outside and triangular in the middle. by the time i got home. i just saw helicopters patrolling the areas i described above. its better to explain in person but if you have questions feel free to call. but this is not my only experience seeing ufos.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed two ufo's last night

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 5:20 on thursday november 19, 2015 i witnessed three glowing lights changing color from red to white to green, as they flew east north-east, over my house. they made a loud roar sound which i thought was gusty winds as our weather in wisconsin is very windy today.   but as i watched them fly away they were sort of bouncing, or dancing, changing places, and then vanished.
i was looking out my front windows as i was feeding my cats, and noticed the lights flying away towards the east as i looked out the window.  they had a short formation that sorts of looked like a triangle, but changed places and bounced around. 
i felt very excited, and wanted to go get my phone, but changed my mind thinking it was safer for me to stay in the house then go to my car and get my phone.
my excitement made me feel light headed. i turned on my wi-fi to connect with you immediately, as i sit down to write to you, my cats are acting funny. 
i have had similar things happen in the past. i use to live out in nevada.
content.summary: From my front windows, facing east, first i heard a very loud roaring sound. at first i thought it was gusty winds blowing, but hen noticed 3glowing orbs. they were hovering above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, i was looking at the day time moon and saw a tiny shiny orb, i first thought it was venus, moved very slowly across sky then faded out, i think it was to slow for a plane or satellite , it moved maybe 15 degrees across the sky in about 5 minutes about 15 you degrees about the horizon, i felt odd seeing such a thing..I lost sight when it faded away in the blue sky
content.summary: Near the moon, tiny shiny orb, first thought it was venus, moved very slow across sky then fadded, to slow for a plane or satellite

content.detailedDescription:
My ufo experience

all my life (now 67 years old), i’ve looked to the sky hoping to see something that would affirm my belief that there was life other than here on earth.
all my life, i’ve been looking for fast and erratic moving lights.  last thanksgiving week, i observed something that was all the contrary.
behind my home, i have a man-cave where i spend much of my time in that my wife and i have totally different tastes in tv programming.  this particular evening which i think was the weekend after thanksgiving, 2012, i exited my man-cave, locked it, and turned for the house.  as i cleared the overhang of the covered patio and stepped onto the pavement around the pool, i looked up slightly to my right, and there it was as vivid as anything i’d ever seen in my life.  it’s like my eyes went straight to it.  
my house is due west of my man-cave, and on this evening, the moon was about ¾ full and hadn’t been up very long, and the air was very crisp, clear and cool.  the sky (for south louisiana) was unusually crystal clear.   the sight of the craft stopped me dead in my tracks.  it was as clear and vivid as anything these cat-surgery eyes had ever seen. 
at about a 30 degree angle from horizon and about the same degrees north of west, there was a v-shaped craft.  not knowing the size, if i had held a ruler up to the sky, it would have measured probably about an inch long, so i’m guessing it was pretty far up there.  if i were to guess, i would say it was about 2 miles horizontally and i’m guessing 1 mile vertically from my vantage point, or positioned somewhere between carencro and cankton, la., just nw of lafayette, la.  
the craft was facing due north with a bright star (or planet) just off its nose…. i’m thinking kind of bottom right.   as i said, i’ve been looking for fast moving bright objects all these years, but this craft was not moving at all.  it was dead stopped!!  i could tell this by its relativity to that bright star.  it was just sitting there!!  and the other thing that caught my eyes was the fact that there were no lights – none.  i know i would have seen any strobes from my vantage point because i see them all the time in that my home is directly under a major east/west flyway, and i can see the strobe lights on commercial jets 5 miles up.  additionally, there was no noise, and once again, i can hear those jets 5 miles up on a clear night.
  
as i said, the craft was v-shaped (about 60 degrees) and very majestic looking.  the outside v and inside v looked to be parallel to one another, and the tail of each wing was somewhat tapered inward.  the end of the tails also appeared to be flat.  the bottom of the left wing was black and the right wing (toward me) appeared soft matted texture gray texture.  the one toward me (left wing) was probably reflecting the moonlight.  this also makes me think the wings were slanted upward slightly (about 5-10 degrees) and that the belly was not round because of the distinct separation of the two colors.  it was a very sharp line from the point of the craft the inside of the v.  all i could see was the bottom of the wings, but the craft appeared to be level, and i could see no openings or contour marks.  also, i didn’t see anything that would have suggested an engine or engines, and i really don’t know of anything that large that can hover in one place that long and do so without making a bunch of noise.

at no time was i startled, and i really don’t know why.  i knew at the time i was looking at something that i had never seen before anywhere, not even on tv.  i watched it for a good 3 to 4 minutes, and at no time did it deviate from its relativity to that bright star.  it was almost boring.  
as i said earlier, it was cool outside, and i had short sleeves on, so i thought i’d go in the house, get a jacket and wake up the wife to come look at it with me.  my wife locks the back door, even with me in the back and with a pair of dobermans at her bedside.  so, i reached in my pocket for my keys, looked down momentarily to pick out the house key (the moon was really bright), and when i looked back up, it was gone!!  i quickly looked all around the sky, and nothing.  i don’t know if it just disappeared or took off like a bat out of hell.   it’s almost like it knew i was watching it waiting its chance to do whatever it did.  i’m still kicking myself in the ass knowing that i’ll probably never know!!
 
trying to take a picture with the cell phone for whatever reason never crossed my mind.  after all those years of wanting to see something, for whatever reason, when it did happen, it seemed almost non-eventful.  but, i did tell the wife about it when i crawled into bed.

i really wanted to share this with someone who can relate.  i tried sending this to george noory several years back, but heard nothing.  

this is the absolute truth, and i would have no problem taking a lie detector test on this.  i would be very interested in knowing if the lafayette, la. airport may have caught something on radar around this time that seemed strange, but it's probably too long ago.  the craft would have been somewhat northwest of the airport about 6-10 miles, it would have been dead stopped for a while, and as i said, it would have either simply disappeared on the screen or took off very quickly.  i don’t think there’s anything in or out of that airport that late at night (around midnight), so i don’t even know if anyone would be in the airport tower or observing the radar, but they may have it in some radar memory banks.  it may be worth researching.  i’m thinking the friday or saturday night after thanksgiving, 2012, but definitely sometime that week between the hours of 10 pm and 1:00 am.
content.summary: V-shaped not moving & disappeared when i looked away for about 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: On august 31, 2015 between 1 and 2 pm i had taken my dog outside to go to the bathroom.  we had gone back onto the  deck when i heard the sound of a small plane. i looked up to see the plane but it was not in sight. i felt completely compelled to look backward from the sound of the small plane. when i did there was a huge beautiful shiny ufo. i was absolutely unable to take mhy eyes off of it. i'd say it was close to 100 feet across and almost as deep. there were no windows. it looked solid. it was a beautiful clear day with no clouds and the sun was shining bright. when i was finally able to look away i leaned back and tried to get my husband out to the deck to see. and when i looked back the ufo was gone. i felt content and quite happy for the rest of the day. it was so beautiful and so close to the ground and near the house.
content.summary: Heard small plane while on my deck looked into beautiful clear sky felt compelled to look behind and saw this huge ufo

content.detailedDescription: My stepdaughter is a teacher and , along with other teachers and  students she was walking to a bus, saw a group of shining objects circling in the sky. the students were scared and she calmed them, but had no clue what the objects were. there were approximately 30 to 40 objects that gleamed with the sunlight, then all suddenly disappeared
content.summary: Sighted by schoolteacher and students outside a school

content.detailedDescription: Two objects in the sky that hovered and the one top right corner quickly departed qnd disappeared
content.summary: Hovered and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house when my 3 yr old son came in the house saying superman was in the sky. i went outside to look and saw a bullet shape object in the sky moving slowly towards my home. i went inside and got my sony video camera and recorded what we saw. i've showed several people this video and some said weather ballon others say drone but i don't know it's always been a mystery to me.
content.summary: Bullet shaped object moving slowly

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While in the country buying a car from a couple me and another lady seen a neon yellow roundish u.F.O. i say a big as a small car she said as big as a child's swimming pool. i observed it to the south of me was just there all of a sudden, stayed still for maybe 2 seconds then dropped diagonally was about "kite" level about a half mile away. i asked if there was an airport or something over that way. the couple said 'nothings over that way". then as we spoke the lady seen it behind me. (north) i asked her what color it was (for my sanity sake) she said it was round and yellow. definitely wasn't anything ive ever seen in the store or available for military. it is however not my first sighting though it was neon blue...And almost 20 years ago. time possibly missing. strange marks. weird stuff i don't like to talk about. enough about that.
content.summary: Not a drone, plane, heliicopter, or meterite. lady i was buying car from seen it too. bright neon yellow.

content.detailedDescription: This happend to my husband. i was spending the night at my parents, he was going home from their house. it usually takes 20-25 minutes. i kept calling him and getting no answer. over 2 hours later he called me and said he didn't know why it took him so long to get home and that he hadn't  went anywhere else. which i didn't believe him at the time. this of course caused an arguement. he then reluctantly told me the last thing he remembered was seeing strange lights above the apple orchard on rest church rd. he said they were following along with the car, and the next thing he knew he was home and over 2 hours had passed. i admit i was pretty pissed at him that night, but decided to let it go. the next day his eyes were hurting really bad i had to end up taking him to the emergency room. he thought maybe something was in them. they washed his eyes out with him screaming in pain, and put dye in them to help see if anything was in his eyes.There wasn't. they said his eyes were burnt kinda like welders flash. they kept asking him if he had done any welding that day, and we kept telling them no. i started to tell the nurse about the lights he saw the night before, and he begged me not to. when he wasn't paying attention i stepped out into the hall and told her anyway. i figured she might think we were both crazy, but she didn't. she actually believed me, she said she couldn't figure any other way to explain it. my husband (now ex husband, we remain good friends) will not talk to anyone about that night. his current wife wouldn't know if i hadn't told her. i am positive by the way he acts when this incident is mentioned that he remembers way more about that night then cares too, and he is traumatized by whatever happened to him.
content.summary: My husband was going home from my parents and saw strange lights above the apple orchard. he lost 2 hours, and could not remember getting home. .

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving down route 132 north. i saw 2 lights and i asked my wife, i don't remember a tower being there. then 2 more lights came on and then 2 more. six altogether. it was moving from the north from the direction from wpafb.Â 

the lights came towards us. they were 6 feet in diameter when they got close. it was 50 feet in the air and 50 feet away. it made no noise. â we stopped in the road. the craft moved to the east at about 5 mph. there was another vehicle behind us. i don't know if they reported the sighting or not.Â
content.summary: Saw 2 lights then 2 more then 2 more then then turned east.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter and i were driving north on drake road when we noticed the really bright and fully formed rainbow so we decided to pull over, into the empty mercantile bank parking lot to take photos and get a good look at it.  with my iphone's camera, i took 2 photos of my daughter and the rainbow behind her.  i then took 2 more photos of the rainbow, trying to get a good shot of the different colors because they were so vibrant. after 2 photos, i looked up to see what my daughter was doing and if i had the best spot of the rainbow to get a picture and then noticed what looked like a diamond shape of 4 very bright flickering white/goldish/redish lights moving first from east to west (toward us) then the lights banked quickly to the south and continued banking all the way back to the east, at a lower altitude.  as their initial turn to the south, the lights started shifting and it was then very evident that this was 4 separate lights which were now flying in a straight line with 3 in a row and 1 a little off-set like ( * * *    * ).  as the lights flew away from us, the outside one broke away and took off to the south, southeast at a very high rate of speed while the others continued east at an increased rate of speed.  the whole time the lights were brilliantly bright, just unreal bright from all angles that we saw them from and continued to flash in a random manner, not together and with no noticeable pattern.  the flashing of the lights was really fast between the different colors and the only reason i am able to describe 3 different colors is that i could make out white and orange, my daughter saw goldish yellow and my wife saw reddish orange. we finally lost sight of the objects as they flew behind the tree line.  we were super excited upon seeing this because you hear stories and read things but never get to actually see it.  every photo i tried to get, once i noticed them turned out like garbage and they didn't even show up; however, the 2 photos that i took before i noticed the lights did capture the objects (they look small and far away because of the crappy phone camera, like when trying to take a picture of the moon and then that looks tiny on camera).  the photos that i have show the lights when they were in their initial diamond shaped flight pattern.  i'm attaching the photos and i haven't monkeyed with them, didn't even want to circle them or rotate the picture because i don't want anybody saying they're faked.  the pictures show the lights on the inside of the rainbow and the lights are bright white but small.  still really excited about the whole thing.
content.summary: Very bright group of 4 lights witnessed by me and my family while photographing rainbow

content.detailedDescription: While traveling on an unlit road toward the belt highway at 1:00, two dark forms slowly crossed the road just above the tree line. the rate of speed was slow enough that the objects, moving perpendicular in relation to the vehicle, took more than 5 seconds to traverse the 2-lane road before disappearing behind the trees. they were rectangular or cigar-shaped, and were completely silent as they moved. from a distance, the objects looked as if a slight haze surrounded them, but as we drove almost directly underneath, it became clear that they were solid and much darker than the clear night sky around them. our car headlights may have caused the haze effect as the haziness disappeared once we were on the other side. both objects moved at the same rate of speed and in such a tight formation that the two forms might have actually been two volumes joined together in some way. we lost sight once they crossed over the treeline. we were surprised and confused but kept traveling until we were clear of the trees, and again saw the object on the other side before driving onto the brightly-lit highway and losing sight of the object(s) for the last time.
content.summary: Two unlit objects crossed slowly and silently over the road above us, just above treeline.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, at first of all i want to apologize for my bad english, but i hope you can understand everything i write down here.

happening time 6th of july 21.49 europe time.

my girlfriend, my buddy, and me talking about an creative project, with an dark sky as background.(around 17 a clock)

in the later stages of the evening i took my camera around 21.45 and shoot some testshoot, from the sky with my camera, just to checkout what iso value would be the best and what type of f and stuff like this.

then i took another testshoot, from the sky and put down the camera from my eyes to checkout the photo,then i look forward to the sky, and saw this red, glowing ball in front of me.( i was to perplexed to think about the distance of it.)

at first i thougt it could be a helicopter or something like this, but the object still stand for at least 10 seconds or more, and it doesn't make any noise, i call my buddy to have a look at this, but only 3 to 5 seconds later the object still fly away in such an high speed that we couldn't track it again.
it change the direction so fast that it couldn't be an flight plane .

i mean it comes in 5 seconds, at the time were i shoot a simple photo stands there and is faster far away than it comes .


so my friend and i take a look at the photo, and discussing about it what it could be !

i didn't saw any light streak in real, and on the photo you also can't see any of this, no lightcone, or flashing lights, like a plane would have.

we stand for more than 5 minutes of the balcony.
and look in the sky with the hope to see another on of this object´s (whatever it was )

after 5 minutes of waiting another object is fly on us with an white dazzling light, but after a few seconds it disappear.

it comes without any noise and flight path, and goes without it, exactly like the first sighting but this time with an white light.
like someone has beamed it there.

my girlfriend, my buddy & i we all are convinced that this must be "ufo´s" just because, 2 unidentified objects, with out any noise and without any flightpath,coming faster as there staying.
and leaving with an higher speed so fast that we haven't a chance to see it again. 

im very happy that i had the chance to saw this in my life, and to share this with you thank you for attention !

i upload the normal photo how i shoot the object, as .Jpg and as full quality picutre in .Dng
so that you can see there is nothing edited or something else.

also i upload the photo edited with black and white that you can see how bright it shine.
content.summary: My girlfriend, my buddy and i saw 2 glowing objects without any noise standing in the air for a few seconds and disappears to fast to track them again.From on object i made a photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house in canoga park, we had just got back from hiking at stoney point park in chatsworth. i was absorbing the commercial and cessna planes pass by and a few small clouds, i was hoping to see something. when i noticed a silver ball heading south in a straight path at a high speed, way faster than the commercial plane that had passed by earlier. i watched as it pass us and i asked my friend if he can see it but he could not see it. i was excited to see a ufo over the san fernando valley, i have seen ufo's over the east los angeles and bell gardens area. so i texted my friend in east los angeles to tell him what i had just witnessed and he told me that "secret military operations to divert lax planes for a week". i lost track of it as it got further south in the direction towards the beach.
content.summary: Outside of my friends house when something made me look up at the sky and i noticed a silver metallic ball heading south at a high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I took these photos of the sun rising while working early morning on a mountainside. elevation was approx 2500 ft. i didn't see any objects while i took the photos since i was taking the photo of the amazing sunrise, the air was clear and there was no rain or dust in the air. it was a calm cool morning. i took the pictures and went back to working. just yesterday i looked at the picture and saw small bright dots, as you can see there seems to be a few orb like anomalies, which are interesting to me. the two photos were taken a few seconds apart, the first one was taken out of focus so i took another, time laps between the two is very short only seconds, and what intrigues me is the fact that the second photo shows the two lower orbs have changed position, as well as intensified in brightness. they have rings in the first photo.
these may be nothing but light show on my camera, but the rings and movement between the two pictures makes me think this is something more. could it be ufo 's ??
content.summary: I was at work in the morning, i was up in a mountainous area logging. i took a picture of the sun rising over the mountain top, noticed orbs after.

content.detailedDescription: I was with 2 of my friends.  my girlfriend and i were sitting on the curb with our backs to the houses on my side of the street while our male friend bounced a basketball in the street.  we first noticed the object after our friend froze mid-bounce.  i knew immediately it was a ufo.  it hovered over my neighbor's roof, about 12 to 15 feet above.  it made no noise or wind.  it was a classic disc shape with colored lights around the outside.  i believe the body of the craft was metallic.  we were terrified.  our male friend took off running down the street, while my girlfriend and i ran into my home, next door to where this craft was hovering. i never saw it again, at least that i can remember.
content.summary: A classic disc like craft hovered about12-15 feet directly over my neighbor's house.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garage around 9:15 pm and noticed a light in the northern sky flying south. it was especially bright, which caught my attention. i decided to take a few pictures of it. after reviewing the photos, i noticed a bright spot in the picture that wasn't there when i took it. in reviewing my pictures, taken with my iphone 6s with the 'live picture' function activated. the spot appears in the picture, and moves when the live picture function is activated. it may be a camera flare of some sort, or is it?
content.summary: I was in my garage and noticed a light traveling low, slow and moving to the south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my job at about 7:30pm to meet a friend at a bar off of moorpark rd and thousand oaks blvd called the tipsy goat. i arrived and was there for about an hour and a half before my friend decided not to show up. i had then made plans to meet a friend across town the opposite direction to play pool at a local dive bar called pjs pub. i finally left the tipsy goat at approximately 9:00pm. i drove onto moorpark rd to head my way to the pjs pub on the way there i needed to get gas for my car ,which is old and the gages don't work so i need to estimate my gas when to fill up.I knew it was about time to, but planned on getting gas after the pjs pub. on my way down moorpark rd i had my radio on listening to 95.5 klos radio station. all of a sudden my radio shuts off completely. it didn't phase me because then i thought my car was going to die which was unfortunate, but it happens sometimes when i'm short on gas, but surprisingly my car was still on and functioning which was unusual. at this time i noticed my oil gage was moving quickly and this threw me off because they don't work as far as my gages go for my car. i then decided to pull over to a convenient gas station off moorpark rd and janss rd to put in gas. afterwards i carried onto moorpark rd to head to the pub. i was then coming up to the thousand oaks high school which has a football field and bright lights. i always notice these lights because they are bright and right off the main road moorpark. as i was driving up passing the high school the lights were on, but then i noticed a new set of lights bright". i took a double take because these lights were in the sky and there were about 15 objects hovering over between city of moorpark and thousand oaks. i then pulled my car in between the thousand oaks high school and recreation center. with my keys still in the ignition i jumped out of my car and ran onto the grass of the park next to the recreation center to take a good look at what i was witnessing. these lights were very large and they were in a formation of a triangle with two more objects on two of the sides of this formation. it was unbelievable, i looked around for other witnesses, but no one but me. dogs were barking and going crazy around the neighbor hood. i was so freaked i called my father and told him to come quick and witness what i was seeing he then was on his way with my uncle from out of town. mind you when i had called my dad i told him i was completely sober and hadn't had any drinks. he knew i was telling the truth by the way i spoke because i was freaking out. as he was on his way i noticed a plane flying closer to the formation of objects in the sky. this plane was moving more faster then a normal plane, i can only assume this was a jet. as it got close enough each of the 15 objects starting to dim off their lights and there were the only two objects remaining that were on the sides of this formation, these two objects starting moving towards the city of moorpark. when my father arrived i explained what i just witnessed and we decided to drive toward the direction the 2 objects were moving to. at this time he nor my uncle were able to witness the remaining objects, which is why we drove towards the direction they moved toward. we then were passed the intersection of moorpark rd and olsen rd and pulled over into a neighbor hood to see if we can see anything in the sky, but they were gone. after our talk my father and uncle headed back home. but then i noticed something else in the sky something completely different, this object was a lot lower in elevation and was red and not stable. my dad called me and noticed the same object on his way back home, it looked like it had a flame in it and was wavy" it ascended higher into the atmosphere or which then looked like it burnt out". my dad understood that this was completely different from the objects i had witnessed, which were higher in elevation and extremely larger in size plus the brightness of light coming off each object. he then just went home and i stayed to do some more investigating. i then noticed another object ascending into the sky very low in elevation same as what my dad and i had witnessed red and flame inside which was odd. as i drove around the neighbor hoods close to these events i came across these 2 bags on the street . i pulled over and picked one up and it was a bag people would use to light a candle or torch to float this into the sky for events or celebrations. i was very confused, and disturbed because the first objects i had seen were huge and high as a plane in elevation and were stable in a perfect formation and had total control of them selves. today i have this  bag of proof of somebody trying to throw witnesses off from the real things out there. from this day forward i know what i saw and it wasnt a bag with some torch in it.Something turned off my radio in my car and i just know the feeling when something isn't normal.

thank you
content.summary: 15 objects in a triangle formation plus two objects on two of the sides

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone, at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on 11/18/2015
------------------------------------------------------------------------

on the night of the 4th of july this year,2015, my daughter, called me out to see the orange/yellow orb flying overhead. it seemed intelligently controlled, then two more came in the same exact path, one after another. witnesses children and wife all the the orbs. they were a reddish/orange color, and traveling over the golf course about 2 blocks east. they were silent, and followed the exact same path. they seemed to disappear in the same area, a residential area. 
ford aeronautics is near by, but witness is sure they were not involved.
witnesses' daughter, who lives in california has video of the 4th of july flyover.

two years before witness had observed a metallic sphere hovering in the area about where the orbs disappeared. 

three weeks ago witnesses wife and children saw a metallic sphere in the same area during the day.
content.summary: On the night of the 4th of july this year, my daughter, called me out to see the orange/yellow orb flying overhead. it seemed intelligently controlled, the two more came in the same exact path

content.detailedDescription: I had just got off work, and was pulling into my driveway at 10:01pm, when i saw 3 unusual lights hovering just above the crest of my roofline. i parked the car, and rushed to get out. once out of the car i looked to see if they had moved, but they were still there. it was then that it finally registered in my mind to note the characteristics of them. they were 3 white lights in a triangle formation that were slowly pulsing on and off. each one was about the size of an 1/8" ball berring held at arms length and the whole formation was about the size of a 3/8" berring at arms length. i was very excited to see it, but still had the frame of mind to pull my phone out and try to record video of the object. when i started recording i noticed that the lights were not appearing on my screen at all, and then they started moving towards the south west. i kept recording anyway until the object disappeared behind my roof line. my house faces directly north, and the lights started about 1/4" above the roof line. there was a nearby star that i used as reference to tell that they started out non moving, but it started moving when i started recording. after they had gone behind the roof and i stopped recording i noticed that i had no recording saved on my phone. i managed to successfully do a test record of the ground afterword. i then called my best friend and told him what i had seen. when i first saw it i figured it was a plane, however i soon realized it wasn't moving and the lights weren't blinking like a planes do. not to mention that most planes have multicolored lights, but these were all white, and they all pulsed in unison. given the evidence my only conclusion is that they are not any known craft or object.
content.summary: Saw triangle lights above my roofline. it hovered then moved on. phone wouldn't save recorded video.
